**The Upper Clarity Scripture on the Nine Elixirs and the Transformation of Embryonic Essence: Central Record**

**Scripture Title:** *The Upper Clarity Scripture on the Nine Elixirs and the Transformation of Embryonic Essence: Central Record* (abbreviated as *Central Record of Embryonic Essence*).

Author unknown, approximately dated to the Eastern Jin dynasty. A foundational scripture of the early Shangqing (Upper Clarity) tradition. One fascicle.

**Source:** *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, Orthodox Section, Part One.

**The Upper Clarity Scripture on the Nine Elixirs and the Transformation of Embryonic Essence: Central Record** (alternate title: *Nine Heavens’ Jade Embryo and Numinous Radiance*)

**Table of Contents #1**
- Talisman of the Nine Elixirs’ Yang Spirit for Upper Transformation
- Talisman of Embryonic Essence for Refining the Spirit
- Talisman of the Three Passes and Twelve Knots within the Embryonic Sac
- Talisman of the Nine Elixirs’ Flowing Essence for Preserving Life

The text of the *Nine Elixirs’ Upper Transformation* was bestowed by the Lord Emperor of the Grand Tenuity upon the Jade Lads of the Three Heavens. It enables the ninefold cyclical refinement of essence, the return of spirit, the dissolution of the purple embryonic knots, and the nourishment of the primordial orifices with flowing essence. Internally, it fills the marrow; externally, it overflows through the nine apertures, brightening them. The bones are refined, and each joint receives the true. Its method is lofty and wondrous, concealed within the Golden Chamber and Jade Abode of the Nine Heavens’ Numinous Capital. According to the *Luminous Statutes of the Four Poles*, it is transmitted but once in ten thousand kalpas. Only those whose names are inscribed in the Purple Registers of the Upper Clarity in green script may partake of its teachings. Whoever violates its sacred prohibitions shall be smitten by divine soldiers. Those who cultivate it in secret and attain the Dao shall ascend as immortals in broad daylight.

The Venerable Person of the Nine Heavens addressed the Jade Lads of the Three Heavens: "When heaven and earth exchange their revolutions, the two images merge into the true. Yin and yang descend their qi, corresponding above to the Nine Mysteries. The flowing elixir undergoes nine transformations, congealing qi into essence. Essence transforms into spirit, and spirit metamorphoses into humanity. Thus, humans mirror heaven and earth, and their qi follows the natural. The qi of the natural is the essence of the Nine Heavens, which, when transformed into the human body, is contained, nurtured, and nourished within the embryo. After nine months, the qi is full; the qi of the Nine Heavens is pervasive. In the tenth month, birth occurs. The formation of the embryo and its transformation may be auspicious or inauspicious, long-lived or short-lived, for these depend on the purity of the karmic roots and the congealed qi. If the viscera accumulate stagnation and the six palaces suffer damage, the form and spirit will not be firm, and the body will not receive the numinous. When the qi of death enters the orifices, how can one endure? Many engage in cultivation and study yet remain ignorant of this origin. Now, I reveal it to you: the true of a single form, when born, dissolves its knots, nourishes the hundred spirits, and the body naturally radiates light. The inner palaces become luminous, the spirit rests in its abode, and the myriad qi ascend as immortals. Guard this secret; do not lightly disclose it.

All who receive life form the nine elixirs’ upper transformation within the embryonic sac, following the qi of the Nine Heavens. When the qi is full and the spirit complete, they recognize within the embryonic membrane their past lives, know their original roots, and comprehend the karmic cycles of the Nine Heavens’ kalpas that shaped their bodies. Yet upon beholding the yang path and the vastness of the Three Luminaries, they forget the causes of their birth and origin. This arises from the stagnation of the embryonic roots, the blockage of the Three Passes, the disorder of the five palaces, and the obstruction of the gates by the qi of death, preventing the numinous passes from opening and causing the forgetting of karmic causes. If a numinous perfected one entrusts transformation, refining the jade embryo and briefly passing through the purple portal, treading the human path, they emerge naturally radiant, beholding the numinous with luminous splendor. They then ascend bodily to the Nine Heavens, no longer bound to the cycle of congealing essence and receiving qi to become human.

Those who cultivate and study, aspiring to immortality, must refine the body with the nine elixirs, dissolve the knots of the five spirits, guide qi to its original birth, and extinguish the roots at the Three Gates. After nine refinements and ten transformations, the hundred joints become luminous. Once the embryonic knots are severed and the original true is known, one becomes an immortal of the highest rank. Without this method, the Three Palaces remain dull, the qi of death is not extinguished, the stomach does not receive the numinous, qi departs and spirit wanders, the Red Child is not joyful, the palaces lie abandoned, and demonic influences enter the body. Thus, the hundred ailments arise, life is not fulfilled, and the pain is beyond words.

Yang qi is red and is called the Mysterious Elixir. Yin qi is yellow and is called Yellow Essence. When yin and yang intersect and the two qi descend, essence transforms and spirit congeals, corresponding above to the Nine Heavens. The qi of the Nine Heavens then descends to fill the cinnabar field, merging with essence to congeal and unite at the Gate of Life. After nine cycles, this becomes the Nine Elixirs. Through upper transformation and lower congealment, a human is formed. In the first month, qi is received; in the second, the numinous; in the third, transformation is contained; in the fourth, essence congeals; in the fifth, the body and head take shape; in the sixth, the form is transformed; in the seventh, the spirit’s positions are arrayed; in the eighth, the nine orifices become bright; in the ninth, the qi of the Nine Heavens pervades, and sound emerges; in the tenth, the Director of Destinies inscribes the register, and life is received at birth. Thus, humans receive the qi of the Nine Heavens and the essence of yin and yang, called the Nine Elixirs, which together form the human body. Once born as human, one should return to the original true, regulate the five viscera, dissolve the embryonic roots, and sever the gates of death to naturally become an immortal.

All who are born within the embryonic sac receive the qi of the Nine Heavens, congealing essence to form the human body. Yet within the embryo, there are twelve knots that coil around the five viscera, causing stagnation and blockage, knots that cannot be dissolved, and nodes that cannot be extinguished. Thus, human illness arises from the stagnation of nodes, and the end of life comes from the fixation of knots. If one can dissolve the twelve embryonic knots, even the desire for death will be unattainable.

The upper part of the embryo has four knots: the first knot lies within the Muddy Pellet (brain), the second in the mouth, the third in the cheeks, and the fourth in the eyes. To dissolve the four upper knots, on the day of one’s original destiny at dawn, enter a chamber, burn incense, and bow nine times toward the northwest, facing the Primordial Father of the Nine Heavens. Strike the teeth nine times, and thrice invoke the taboo name of the Primordial Father, *Zunhui*. Then bow three times toward the southeast, thrice invoking the taboo name of the Mysterious Mother of the Nine Heavens, *Dunhuan*. Sit upright according to your original destiny, close your eyes, and visualize the Primordial Father: his body is nine inches and nine fen tall, clad in a sash of dark yellow and plain numinous silk. He wears a crown of accumulated nine-tiered pearls and jade, the *Wujijinxian* cap, and resides in the Jade Capital of the Supreme Ultimate within the Nine Heavens, the Treasure Palace of the Cinnabar Numinous Realm in the Cavern of Primordial Purity. He rides a flying chariot of azure radiance, attended by twelve flying dragons and twenty-four immortals, descending from the northwest to enter your body and govern the realm of the Muddy Pellet."

Next visualize the Mysterious Mother: her body is six inches and six fen tall, clad in a sash of azure treasure, divine radiance, brocade, frost-silk, and nine-colored essence. She wears a crown of purple origin and dark yellow treasure, residing above the Nine Qi and the Ultimate Non-Ultimate, within the Sevenfold Radiance of the Jasper Grove, the Cinnabar Chamber of the Jade Treasure, the Cavern of Primordial Purity, the Ninefold Radiance Realm, and the Upper Clarity Precinct. She rides a flying canopy of purple clouds and refined feathered shade, attended by ten supreme phoenixes and thirty-six jade maidens, descending from the southeast to enter your body and govern the Cavern Chamber of the face.

Visualize the Father and Mother transforming into blue and yellow qi, coiling and intertwining, vying above your head and face. When complete, strike the teeth nine times and softly intone:

*"I, [your name], receive the transformation of the Nine Numinosities, yet my qi remains impure, my nodes stagnant and coiled, sealing the numinous gates. Reverently, by my original destiny, I report above to the Lofty Dawn’s Primordial Father and Mysterious Mother, and below to my own body. May the Eight Radiant Scenes shine as one, the Nine Heavens unite in truth, jointly dissolving the four upper knots of the womb-root. May the numinous turn back to guard the gates, the nine apertures knit into immortality, the inner embryo refined and transformed, the Nine Elixirs congeal the spirit, blue transmuted into red, the two qi entwined. May my life span equal the Three Luminaries, and my years endure for countless eons."*

When finished, swallow qi eighty-one times and cease.

Then visualize the King of *Yudan* Immeasurable Heaven, surnamed *Hun*, taboo name *Shuangnianchu*, clad in a nine-colored, seamless, naturally patterned robe, wearing a crown of radiant essence and solar roundness. He governs within the Boundless Dark Terrace and Purple Gate of Heaven, riding a nine-mountain jade wheel, attended by twenty-four jade immortals.

Next visualize the King of *Shangshang Chanshan* Immeasurable Longevity Heaven, surnamed *Xi*, taboo name *Yanniannan*, clad in a nine-colored cloud-patterned robe, wearing a crown of luminous essence and lunar radiance. He governs the Kingdom of Heavenly Kings, the Seven Treasures of the Vermilion Grove, and the Jasper Terrace, riding a twelvefold dark turtle and flying azure feathered canopy, attended by thirty-two jade lads of the Upper Palace.

Next visualize the King of *Xuyan* Heaven, surnamed *Zi*, taboo name *Niannaichu*, clad in a nine-colored robe of the Three Dharma Clouds, wearing a crown of Heavenly Origin and Jade Treasure. He governs the Jade Capital and Numinous Metropolis Palace of Heaven, riding a nine-colored flying swan and threefold plain flying clouds, attended by twenty-four jade maidens of pure numinosity.

Visualize the Three Heavenly True Kings descending above your head and face, transforming into blue, purple, and yellow qi, chaotic as intertwining clouds. They enter through the mouth, ears, and nostrils, encircling your entire face. Then look up and intone:

*"Great Kings of the Three Heavens, Ninefold Mysterious Numinous Immortals, dissolve for me the knots and barriers of my head and face. Transform the Nine Elixirs naturally, descending upon the Golden Gate of Essence. Intermingle the clouds of the Three Perfected, flowing into my body to perfect my spirit. Scour away the qi of death, extinguish the womb-root, secure the numinous radiance, and cast off all baleful afflictions. May each knot be untied, each node receive the true, the dark radiance flow and spread, deeply irrigating the hidden springs. Proclaim my name to the Nine Heavens, return the embryo to immortality, inwardly replete and outwardly full, within and without become spirit."*

When finished, swallow qi nine times and cease.

Next visualize the Eight Radiant Lads of the Upper Realm.

With eyes closed, visualize the brain spirit, named *Awareness Primordial Lad*, styled *Dao Capital*, one inch and one fen tall, clad in white brocade, wearing a three-ridge treasure crown.

The hair spirit, named *Mysterious Father Hua*, styled *Dao Balance*, two inches and one fen tall, clad in dark cloud brocade, wearing a *Wujijinxian* cap.

The skin spirit, named *Permeating Multitude Second*, styled *Dao Link*, one inch and five fen tall, clad in a yellow brocade flying skirt, wearing a Three Qi Treasure Heaven Crown.

The eye spirit, named *Void Supervisor Born*, styled *Dao Lad*, three inches tall, clad in five-colored patterned robes, wearing a *Tongtian* crown.

The neck marrow spirit, named *Numinous Plan Cover*, styled *Dao Circumference*, five inches tall, clad in a white brocade plain skirt, wearing a three-ridge treasure crown.

The spine spirit, named *Benefit Calendar Auxiliary*, styled *Dao Pillar*, three inches and five fen tall, clad in soft white jade robes, wearing a *Xuanyuan* treasure crown.

The nose spirit, named *Surging Dragon Jade*, styled *Dao Subtle*, two inches and five fen tall, clad in azure-yellow plain brocade flying skirt, wearing a *Yuanyou* crown.

The tongue spirit, named *Beginning Ridge Peak*, styled *Dao Fork*, seven inches tall, clad in crimson brocade flying skirt, wearing a *Jinxian* cap.

When the Eight Radiant Scenes are complete, all resemble infants, gathered upon the face, each settled in its place. Then strike the teeth eight times and softly intone:

*"Upper Radiance, one realm, eight spirits unite the true. The qi of the Nine Elixirs transforms and perfects my body. A thousand chariots, ten thousand riders, like clouds dispersing and mist scattering, descend to encircle my head and face, bestowing numinosity and arraying spirit. Above, dissolve the knots and nodes; within, extinguish the womb-root; below, remove the fixed stagnations. Unblock and regulate the Three Passes. The Eight Radiant Scenes guard and protect, sharing the same age as the numinous. The Imperial Lord and Mysterious Mother, turning back to the Lofty Dawn, descend their jade splendor, halting my withered freshness. Return my countenance to crimson, my face to golden immortality. Transform the radiance to pursue lightning, directly entering the Gate of the Sun."*

When finished, swallow qi eight times, then cease, and ingest the talisman of the Upper Transmutation’s Nine Elixirs and Yang Numinosity.

**Talisman of the Upper Transmutation’s Nine Elixirs and Yang Numinosity**
Inscribed in cinnabar on blue paper, three copies.

At high noon, face your original destiny, strike the teeth nine times, and softly intone:

*"Upper Transmutation of the Nine Qi, refining and transforming the hundred spirits. Within, govern the Six Palaces; without, descend the Great Immortals. The Mysterious Mother crafts the essences, dissolving knots and dispersing stagnations, severing and extinguishing the womb-root. The body becomes light, the flesh flies, responding to qi naturally, ascending with qi to stand before the Emperor."*

When finished, ingest the talisman, swallow nine times, and cease.

The knots of the upper realm reside within the precincts of the head and face. On the day of your original destiny, at dawn enter the chamber, silently visualize the true numinous, dissolve the knots and disperse the nodes, sever and extinguish the womb-root. Ingest fluids, swallow qi, and employ the talisman of Yang Numinosity to unblock and regulate the Three Palaces. After three years of this practice, the body will rest and qi strengthen, bones lighten and flesh firm, riding the void to fly, entering and exiting without obstruction.

After nine years, one attains communion with the numinous, conversing with spirits as equals, descending in cloud chariots, ascending into the Emperor’s dawn. This secret transformative Dao must be guarded against disclosure to the uninitiated—its precepts and prohibitions are weighty, and transgression brings calamity upon the Seven Mysteries. Only through clandestine cultivation can one achieve the rank of Supreme Immortal.

Within the middle realm, there are four knots: the first resides among the Five Viscera, the second within the Great Granary, the third within the Large Intestine, and the fourth within the Small Intestine. To dissolve these four knots of the middle realm, on the day of your original destiny at the hour of high noon, enter the chamber, burn incense, and bow nine times toward the northwest, facing the Primordial Father. Thrice invoke the Primordial Father’s taboo name, *Zunhui*; then turn to the southeast and bow three times, facing the Mysterious Mother. Thrice invoke the Mysterious Mother’s taboo name, *Dunhuan*. Sit upright upon your current year’s position, knock the teeth nine times, close the eyes, and visualize the Primordial Father: his form stands nine inches and nine fen tall, clad in a sash of dark yellow and plain numinous silk, his head crowned with a seven-tiered pearl-and-jade cap, the *Wuji Jinxian* coronet, dwelling in the Jade Capital of the Supreme Ultimate within the Nine Heavens, the Vermilion Numinous Precinct of the Cavernous Origin within the Treasure Palace of the Cinnabar Spirit Realm. He rides a flying chariot of azure radiance, accompanied by twelve flying dragons and twenty-four immortals, descending from the northwest to enter the Five Viscera within your body.

Next, visualize the Mysterious Mother: her form stands six inches and six fen tall, clad in a nine-colored sash of luminous brocade, frost-silk, and divine light, her head crowned with the *Ziyuan Xuanhuang* treasure coronet. She dwells in the Sevenfold Radiance Vermilion Chamber of the Nine Qi’s Primordial Ultimate, the Treasure Palace of the Cavernous Origin within the Nine Radiance Precinct of the Upper Clarity Realm. She rides a feathered canopy of flying essence upon purple clouds, accompanied by twelve phoenixes and thirty-six jade maidens, descending from the southeast to enter your Five Viscera.

Visualize the father and mother transforming into blue and yellow qi, merging into a chaos as round as the sun, illuminating the Five Viscera, their radiance shining within and without. Then raise your head and intone:

*"Spirit of the Father, essence of the Mother,
The two qi unite as one,
Nine elixirs congeal and transform,
Nurturing the purple jade of the womb.
Receiving the radiance of the Grand Tenuity,
Destiny linked to the Nine Numinous,
The Emperor unfolds the divine,
Flowing truth to irrigate life.
The knots of the Five Viscera unbind,
The Six Palaces become limpid and clear.
The stomach’s tube opens to wisdom,
The nine orifices grow bright and lucid.
Old nodes disperse and vanish,
A new embryo flourishes anew.
Transforming the body through radiant refinement,
Adorned with the nine stars’ regalia,
The Three Luminaries flank my retinue,
Flying into the Emperor’s court."*

When finished, swallow forty-five breaths and cease.

Next, visualize the Heavenly King of Serene Stillness: surnamed *Jin*, taboo name *Yuyu*, clad in a seven-colored dragon-patterned robe of penetrating light, his head crowned with the *Yin Essence Moonlight* diadem. He governs from the Vermilion Palace’s Jade Terrace in the heavens, riding an eight-scene flying wheel, accompanied by twelve jade immortals.

Then visualize the Heavenly King of Unyielding Joy: surnamed *Ning*, taboo name *Yuyu*, clad in a nine-colored robe of flying frost and cloud-patterned brocade, his head crowned with the *Azure Florescence Year-Star Mystic Essence* coronet. He governs from the nine-tiered Jade Terrace of the Vermilion Chamber in the Heavenly Origin Palace, riding a chariot of white deer and cinnabar radiance, accompanied by twenty-six jade immortals of the Upper Palace.

Next, visualize the Heavenly King of Responsive Transformation: surnamed *Yao*, taboo name *Yuzan*, clad in a nine-colored robe of flowing luminous cloud-brocade, his head crowned with the *White Radiance Grand White Jade Essence* coronet. He governs from the Vermilion Chamber of the Upper Palace in the Heavenly Jade Grove, riding a flying phoenix and soaring auroral purple wheel, accompanied by thirty-six jade immortals of the Grand Perfected.

Finally, visualize the Three Heavenly Perfected Kings descending together into the Five Viscera within your body, transforming into red, white, and black qi, merging into a chaos like cloudy mist. They enter through the aperture of the heart, suffusing the Five Viscera entirely. Then softly intone:

*"Nine elixirs congeal in the auroral void,
Three qi intertwine and bind.
Profound truth fills and descends,
Within and without, bright and clear.
The Great Granary opens and closes,
Intestines and stomach knot into immortals.
Sever and extinguish the stem of nodes,
Dispel and dissolve the roots of old.
Three harmonies form a covenant,
Nine transformations congeal the spirit.
Returning essence to the jade womb,
To perfect this body of mine.
Nine-colored dark yellow,
Flowing essence to irrigate fluids.
Scouring and washing away stagnations,
Within, no dregs or dust remain.
Flourishing branches unite in splendor,
Planting and nurturing the numinous root.
Each aperture grows limpid and bright,
Each node becomes cool and serene.
Bones transform into radiant flight,
Ascending into the Purple Heavens."*

When finished, swallow nine breaths upward and cease.

Next, visualize the Eight Radiant Divine Lads of the Middle Realm. Close the eyes and summon the spirit of the throat: named *Hundred Streams Flow*, styled *Dao Tong*, his form eight inches tall, clad in nine-colored patterned robes, his head crowned with the *Level Heaven Purple Dawn* coronet. The spirit of the lungs: named *Plain Numinous Life*, styled *Dao Ping*, his form eight inches and one fen tall, clad in white brocade and flying cloud robes, his head crowned with the *Nine Origins Treasure Coronet*. The spirit of the heart: named *Brilliant Yang Prosperity*, styled *Dao Ming*, his form nine inches tall, clad in crimson patterned robes, his head crowned with the *Jade Dawn Treasure Heaven Coronet*. The spirit of the liver: named *Opening Lord Lad*, styled *Dao Qing*, his form seven inches tall, clad in flying azure feather skirts, his head crowned with the *Three-Ridge Coronet*. The spirit of the gallbladder: named *Dragon Virtue Constraint*, styled *Dao Fang*, his form three inches and six fen tall, clad in azure, yellow, and green skirts, his head crowned with the *Wuji Jinxian Coronet*. The spirit of the left kidney: named *Spring Origin Perfected*, styled *Dao Qing*, his form three inches and seven fen tall, clad in five-colored transforming light skirts, his head crowned with the *Wandering Coronet*. The spirit of the right kidney: named *Image Other None*, styled *Dao Sheng*, his form three inches and five fen tall, clad in white brocade robes, his head crowned with the *Three Qi Treasure Radiance Coronet*. The spirit of the spleen: named *Treasure Origin Complete*, styled *Dao Qian*, his form seven inches and three fen tall, clad in yellow brocade flying skirts, his head crowned with the *Purple Dawn Coronet*.

When the visualization of the Eight Radiant Lads is complete, they all appear in the form of infants, uniting within the Five Viscera, each settling into its proper place. Then knock the teeth eight times and raise your head to intone:

*"Eight Radiant Lads of the Middle Realm,
Transforming ninefold above,
Refining essence into the jade womb,
Knots of qi in the Purple Tenuity.
Refining the hun and solidifying the po,
All spirits gather and return.
The Emperor unbinds the knots,
Nine orifices scatter and open.
The Mysterious Mother descends with numinosity,
Each node receives its radiance.
Within, replete; without, overflowing,
Flourishing light never wanes.
Attaining union with the Eight Radiant,
Riding the same chariot to fly,
The mandate of my original destiny begins,
As I have visualized and returned.
Carry me upward in ascent,
Parting the gates of the numinous to behold."*

Upon completion, raise your head and swallow eight breaths to conclude, then ingest the talisman of "Embryonic Essence and Refined Spirit." The talisman of *Embryonic Essence and Refined Spirit* is inscribed in yellow on white paper, three copies in total.

At high noon, face the direction of your current year’s station, knock the teeth nine times, and softly intone:
*"Mysterious qi congeals essence,
Yin transforms and Yang arises,
Nine revolutions, Eight Radiant attained,
Riding the flowing chariot,
Descending into my body,
Communing with spirits and anchoring numinosity,
Unbinding knots and scattering tangles,
Four fetters dissolved and purified,
Nine orifices open wide,
Myriad qi universally tranquil,
Riding the void and soaring in radiance,
Ascending into the Grand Clarity."*

Upon completion, ingest the talisman and swallow saliva nine times to conclude.

The four knots of the Middle Realm reside within the Five Viscera. On the day of your original destiny, at dawn, untie the upper knot; at high noon, untie the middle knot, severing the root of the embryonic womb. Ingest numinous fluid, wield the spirit talisman, swallow primordial qi, and commune with the spirit abode. After three years of such practice, the numinous qi will overflow; after nine years of accumulated resonance, you will share a chariot with the spirits, soaring through the Great Void and ascending into the Emperor’s abode. The sublime and wondrous method is no empty Way—those who earnestly seek immortality must deeply guard this scripture.

The Lower Realm also contains four knots: one in the bladder, one in the yin organ, one in the posterior gate, and one in both feet. To untie the four knots of the Lower Realm, on the day of your original destiny at midnight, when the qi of the new day begins, enter your chamber, burn incense, and bow nine times toward the northwest, facing the Primordial Father. Call his name thrice: *"Zun Hui."* Then turn toward the southeast and bow three times, facing the Mysterious Mother. Call her name thrice: *"Dun Huan."*

Face the Grand Year’s station, sit upright, knock the teeth nine times, close your eyes, and visualize the Primordial Father: nine inches and nine fen in height, clad in a sash of dark yellow and plain numinous silk, wearing a cap adorned with seven strands of pearls and jade, the *Wuji Jinxian* crown. He dwells in the Jade Palace of the Great Ultimate within the Nine Heavens, the Treasure Treasury of the Vermilion Numinosity in the Cavernous Origin of the Red Mystery Village. He rides a chariot of azure radiance, accompanied by twelve flying dragons and twenty-four immortals, descending from the northwest into the Five Viscera and bladder within your body.

Next, visualize the Mysterious Mother: six inches and six fen in height, clad in a nine-colored sash of azure treasure, divine radiance, brocade, frost-like gauze, and embroidered silk. She wears a crown of purple origin and dark yellow treasure, dwelling in the Sevenfold Radiance of the Jade Grove within the Nine Qi and Wuji, the Treasure Treasury of the Cavernous Origin in the Ninefold Radiance Village of the Upper Clarity. She rides a canopy of flying essence and purple clouds, accompanied by twelve phoenixes and thirty-six jade maidens, descending from the southeast into your bladder and down to both feet.

Visualize your father and mother transforming into azure and yellow qi, merging into a chaos as round as the sun, illuminating your entire body inside and out. Then raise your head and intone:
*"Yin and Yang harmoniously unite,
Dual qi resplendently clear,
Above transforms into mysterious cinnabar,
Below revolves into yellow essence,
Embracing the embryo and undergoing transformation,
The body assumes no fixed form,
The Emperor oversees and illumines,
Nine orifices receive numinosity,
Twelve knots of the departments,
Dissolved and extinguished in the Yellow Court,
Eight Radiant entwine and bind,
The stomach’s knot becomes purple jade,
Three hun refined,
Seven po tranquil,
Myriad spirits treasured and anchored,
Within and without in perfect balance,
Three Realms and Eight Radiant,
Born together with me,
Convey me in flight and ascent,
To ascend and reach the Jade Clarity."*

Upon completion, swallow twenty-four breaths to conclude.

Next, visualize the Brahma Treasure Heavenly King, surnamed Jing, named *Wuyun Yao*, clad in a nine-colored robe of flowing clouds and flying dawn, wearing a crown of flowing cinnabar, crimson treasure, and luminous essence of the stars. He governs the Sevenfold Radiance Palace in the southern heavens, riding a chariot of flowing radiance, vermilion clouds, and jade canopies, accompanied by twelve jade immortals of the Upper Palace.

Then visualize the Brahma-Makaya Heavenly King, surnamed Xuan, named *Dian Hong*, clad in a nine-colored robe of primordial phoenix and flying clouds, wearing a crown of dark dawn, morning stars, and flowing essence. He governs the Purple Jade Terrace of the Ninefold Mystery Phoenix City in the heavens, riding a flying wheel of white unicorn and plain clouds, accompanied by thirty-two jade lads of the Great Florescence.

Next, visualize the Parinata Heavenly King, surnamed Yu, named *Ling Kun*, clad in a nine-colored robe of seamless dark clouds and treasure, wearing a crown of *Wuji* flowing yellow and celestial essence. He governs the Ninefold Chambers of the Jade Capital’s Great Existence Wondrous Palace in the celestial mounds, riding a five-colored cloud chariot, accompanied by twelve jade lads of the Great Mystery.

Visualize the Three Heavenly True Kings descending together into your body, residing in the bladder and down to both feet, transforming into purple, green, and azure qi, merging into a mist like clouds, entering through the yin organ and flowing into the bladder, posterior gate, and both feet, illuminating inside and out. Then intone:
*"Three Heavens nurture the embryo,
Nine qi congeal the spirit,
Above transforms into mysterious cinnabar,
Below revolves into immortal transformation,
Dual images descend and unite,
To perfect my body,
Six stomachs of jade splendor,
Nine palaces receive the true,
Twelve knots and nodes,
Each severed at the root,
Expelling defiled qi,
Five numinous arrayed,
Mysterious Mother exhales essence,
Refining and transforming into radiant freshness,
Golden immortals wing the numinous,
Jade splendor composes the chapter,
Inscribed in the Azure Palace,
Ever attending the Emperor of Dawn."*

Upon completion, raise your head and swallow nine breaths to conclude.

Next, visualize the Eight Radiant Divine Lads of the Lower Realm.

Close your eyes and summon the spirit of the stomach, named *Tong Zhu Yu*, styled *Dao Zhan*, seven inches in height, clad in a flying skirt of yellow brocade, wearing a *Pingtian Zichen* crown.

The spirit of the hollow intestines, named *Zhao Teng Kang*, styled *Dao Huan*, two inches and four fen in height, clad in a single robe of crimson, wearing a three-ridged crown.

The spirits of the large and small intestines, named *Peng Song Liu*, styled *Dao Chu*, two inches and one fen in height, clad in a flying skirt of yellow and crimson, wearing a *Yuchen Baotian* crown.

The spirit of the diaphragm, named *Shou Xiang Bo*, styled *Dao Xu*, nine inches and one fen in height, clad in a nine-colored patterned robe, wearing a *Feichen Yu* crown.

The spirit of the chest and diaphragm, named *Guang Ying Zhai*, styled *Dao Chong*, five inches in height, clad in a flying skirt of white brocade, wearing a *Wuji Jinxian* crown.

The spirits of the two flanks, named *Pi Jia Ma*, styled *Dao Cheng*, four inches and one fen in height, clad in a skirt of red and white, wearing a *Jiuyuan Baoguan* crown.

The spirit of the left yin and right yang, named *Fu Liu Qi*, styled *Dao Gui*, two inches and three fen in height, clad in a skirt of blue, yellow, and white, wearing a *Yuanyou* crown.

The spirit of the right yin and left yang, named *Bao Biao Ming*, styled *Dao Sheng*, two inches and three fen in height, clad in a skirt of blue, yellow, and white, wearing a three-ridged crown.

When the Eight Radiant Assemblies are fully visualized, all appear in the form of infants, each settled in their place. A thousand chariots and ten thousand riders fill my yin, bladder, posterior gate, and the spaces within my two feet. Then, knock the teeth eight times and raise a prayer, saying:

*"The Eight Radiant Ones of the lower region, scattered in form and transformed in spirit, embrace the primordial and nurture qi. They refine the fetal purple mist. The Primordial Father of Grand Unity and the Mysterious Mother entwine. The two essences flow and irrigate, containing and nourishing the inner perfected ones. The Imperial Lord establishes the register; the Controller of Destiny alters the years. The knotted joints disperse; the nine apertures become fresh. The hun and po are preserved and secured. The ten thousand spirits are gathered and governed, ascending with me together to reach the Jade Dawn."*

When finished, swallow saliva eight times and stop.

Next, visualize the inner spirit of the Dao’s unity, named *Dai Wu Ma*, styled *Dao Jisheng*, two inches and two fen in height, clad in a skirt of purple brocade adorned with luminous patterns, wearing a *Wuji Jinxian* crown. He resides in the Cinnabar Field below the navel, governing the Three Regions and the Twenty-Four Perfected Ones.

Knock the teeth thirty-two times and softly pray, saying:

*"Great spirit of the Mysterious Above, governing all without exception, settling and guarding the hidden valley, flowing essence beneath the purple canopy. The host of perfected ones attend in spirit; the Three Regions exchange protection. The Imperial Lord illumines the seat; the Mysterious Mother rejoices in offering. The Nine Origins unite in accord; the Controller of Destiny extends the journey. The Three Dawns shine together, binding with the perfected in a sash."*

When finished, swallow the twenty-four breaths, then stop and ingest the Inner Talisman of the Three Passes and Twelve Knotted Fetal Bonds.

**Inner Talisman of the Three Passes and Twelve Knotted Fetal Bonds**
Write in red on bamboo membrane, three slips. After completing the visualization, face the Year-Star and ingest them, softly praying:

*"The four knots of the upper region solidify the Muddy Pellet; they cast one into the flowery countenance and cut short one’s flourishing years. The four knots of the middle region gather misfortune into a flock, coiling and binding the Great Granary, hastening the wandering hun. Malevolent influences and treachery penetrate; radiant dreams are not steadfast. The four knots of the lower region bind the posterior gate, obstruct the nine apertures, and sever the root of life.

The Imperial Lord proclaims the numinous; the Five Scripts of the Nine Heavens dissolve and unbind the joints, extinguishing all roots and sources. The Primordial Father and Mysterious Mother nurture and nourish the Three Passes. The Eight Radiant Ones guard and prepare; true qi scatters and distributes. Above is clear, below is yellow; outside is square, inside is round. Exterior and interior are equally pure, descending to summon the Three Origins. Attaining the Eight Radiant Ones, one rides the clouds of dawn and soars through the void, ascending to the Golden Gate."*

When finished, swallow twelve breaths, then swallow twenty-four times, and stop.

On one’s natal day, at the three hours of dawn, noon, and midnight, dissolve the twelve knotted joints of the Three Regions. On the eight seasonal nodes, this practice should also be performed to hasten the nearness of immortality.

Cultivating on the eight nodes follows the same visualization as the three hours. Practicing this for three years, one’s face will radiate jade light, the body will reflect golden perfection, flesh will diminish, bones will become light, and the inner knots will transform into an immortal. After nine years, the numinous descends, and one ascends to heaven in broad daylight.

Those who study without this method labor in vain. The knots remain undissolved, coiled and entangled day by day. Spirit and qi do not spread; malevolent influences enter the body. The wandering hun scatter—how can one attain immortality?

Sincere and devoted scholars must diligently seek this source. Dissolving the knots at the three hours, one will surely attain the highest immortality.

The *Returning Womb’s Jade Splendor* gathers the Three Passes and receives the perfected. The Three Regions and Eight Radiant Ones, the Twenty-Four Spirits, a thousand chariots and ten thousand riders, together ride the purple mist.

The sublime and wondrous transformation, the *Numinous Writ of the Jade Emperor*—if rashly transmitted or lightly divulged, calamity will extend to the seven ancestors. The dead souls will fill the debt, forever submerged in the river’s source. One’s own person will bear the punishment, suffering the Three Paths and Five Torments, for ten thousand kalpas without release. Scholars, be cautious and guard these words in secret.

The spirits of the Two Radiant Ones are all the transformed spiritual essences of the Nine Heavens. The Primordial Father transforms above; the Mysterious Mother forms the womb. The Nine Heavens nurture and rear, completing the human being. The Twenty-Four Persons each possess numinous passes.

If one wishes to cultivate and study yet does not know how to visualize their forms, the spirits will wander and qi will scatter. Dead qi will knot and sink; malevolent demons will enter the radiance, shortening life and cutting short the years.

If one knows how to cultivate and dissolve the Three Passes, the spirits will settle in their palaces, the numinous will guard the Jade Gate. The knotted joints will dissolve of themselves; dead qi will vanish of itself. The ten thousand spirits will unite in radiance, and one will ascend to heaven in broad daylight.

All people are born endowed with the qi of the Nine Heavens. Qi congeals into essence; essence transforms into cinnabar; cinnabar changes into a human being. The fetal bond is conceived and nurtured according to nature.

Having attained human form, one should return to nourish the original perfected. Let essence overflow the Six Palaces, qi descend to the Spirit Court. Within and without, one will be luminous and fresh, sharing the numinous with the perfected.

This method is lofty and wondrous, not transmitted to lesser immortals. Those who cultivate and attain the Dao will reverse white hair and halt aging, their lifespan equaling the Three Radiant Ones. Heaven and earth will incline toward them. If one rashly divulges its essentials, one’s person will be severely punished.

All scholars of the highest learning must first dissolve the knots of the Three Passes within the body.

The way to dissolve the knots also requires that, in the month of the fetal bond, one nourish the original essence. Let the dead knots sink and dissolve; the Nine Perfected will guard the numinous. True qi having descended, one will naturally attain longevity. When qi and image correspond, one will achieve success without study.

In practicing this method, suppose one was born in the seventh month—then the gestation is ten months. For a ten-month gestation, one receives the qi of the *Parinirmitavaśavartin* Heaven. On the first, eleventh, and twenty-first days of the tenth month, at dawn, noon, and midnight—three times in one month—bathe in fragrant water, burn incense, and enter the chamber. Face the northwest and bow nine times to the Primordial Father of the Nine Heavens. Face the southeast and bow three times to the Mysterious Mother of the Nine Heavens. Then, sit upright facing the lunar station, knock the teeth thirty-six times, close the eyes, and visualize the Heavenly King of *Parinirmitavaśavartin*, surnamed Jade, named *Ling Wu*, clad in a nine-colored, seamless, dark-cloud treasure-fur robe, wearing a *Wuji Liuhuang Tianxing Feijing* crown, riding a five-colored cloud chariot, followed by twelve Jade Lads of the Grand Mystery, descending to enter one’s body and guard the Muddy Pellet Palace.

Visualize verdant clouds swirling densely, crowning and enveloping your body. After a long while, draw the cloud-qi into your mouth and swallow it nine times, then softly intone:

The Primordial spreads qi, the Yang Dao opens and flows,
The Two Images descend in union, azure and yellow follow.
Above, they transform the Nine Elixirs; within the Three Palaces, essence congeals.
Form accords with nature; qi accords with the Great Void.
The Thearch guards the numinous; the Mysterious Mother watches the chamber.
The myriad spirits settle in peace; the six viscera flourish within.
The Nine Heavens’ coronet and sash descend; the Three Radiances shed their light.
The Five Perfected assist and protect; the body returns to emptiness and hollowness.
Riding the void, driving the floating, ascend to the Thearch’s hall.

When finished, swallow qi nine more times, then swallow saliva twenty-four times to conclude. Thus the qi of the Nine Heavens nourishes the body, and when the time comes to form the embryo, stagnation, accumulations, and nodules will not arise again in the Three Passes. Practicing this for three years, one may foreknow events a myriad leagues away and the omens of fortune and misfortune. This is because the joints receive the real, and the orifices open to clarity.

In the eleventh month, receive the qi of *Brahmakāyika* Heaven. On the second, twelfth, and twenty-second days of the month, at dawn, noon, and midnight—three times in one month—bathe in fragrant water, burn incense, and enter the chamber. Face the northwest and bow nine times to the Primordial Father. Face the southeast and bow three times to the Mysterious Mother. Then, sit upright facing the lunar station, knock the teeth thirty-six times, close the eyes, and visualize the Heavenly King of *Brahmakāyika*, surnamed Mystery, named *Yun Hong*, clad in a nine-colored, phoenix-winged, soaring-cloud treasure-fur robe, wearing a *Xuanchen Chensing Liujing* crown, riding a white qilin-drawn, plain-cloud flying chariot, followed by thirty-two Jade Lads of Mount Taihua, descending to enter the Grotto Chamber within your body. Visualize emerald clouds swirling densely, crowning and enveloping your form. After a long while, draw the cloud-qi into your mouth and swallow it nine times, then softly intone:

The Nine Heavens’ flowing elixir transforms and congeals essence above;
The Primordial Father infuses qi; the Mysterious Mother receives the numinous.
The Five Flowers scatter radiance; the Three Perfected merge as one.
The Thearch commands the register; the Great One inscribes life.
Above, the Mysterious; below, the Yellow—within the Three Palaces, all is solemn and pure.
The nine orifices receive the real; the myriad spirits harmonize in peace.
Riding the turning of the years, return to your original form.
Ascend with qi; be born with spirit.
Soaring through the Mysterious Void, ascend to report at the Thearch’s court.

When finished, swallow qi nine more times, then swallow saliva twenty-four times to conclude. Practicing this for three years, the intestines are refined and qi is augmented; one may foresee what has not yet come to pass. After nine years, the bones become light, and one ascends in broad daylight.

In the twelfth month, receive the qi of *Brahma-pāriṣadya* Heaven. On the third, thirteenth, and twenty-third days of the month, at dawn, noon, and midnight—three times in one month—bathe in fragrant water, burn incense, and enter the chamber. Face the northwest and bow nine times to the Primordial Father. Face the southeast and bow three times to the Mysterious Mother. Then, sit upright facing the lunar station, knock the teeth thirty-six times, close the eyes, and visualize the Heavenly King of *Brahma-pāriṣadya*, surnamed Essence, named *Wuyun Yao*, clad in a nine-colored, flowing-cloud, dawn-soaring treasure-fur robe, wearing a *Liudan Jiangguan*, *Yingxing Xuanjing* crown, riding a rosy-cloud, cinnabar-sky jade chariot with feathered canopy, followed by twelve Jade Immortals of the Upper Palace, descending to enter the Grotto Heaven Bright Hall within your body. Visualize violet clouds swirling densely, crowning and enveloping your form. After a long while, draw the cloud-qi into your mouth and swallow it nine times, then softly intone:

The Nine Elixirs flow with essence, transforming and congealing naturally.
The Primordial Father descends in mystery; the Mysterious Mother arrays the numinous.
The Thearch oversees the spirit; the Great One guards the real.
The Controller of Destinies inscribes the register; the Eastern Flower records the immortal.
Flying blossoms of the August Mushroom irrigate the body’s form.
The Eight Radiances and Nine Qi refine and transform the root of the embryo.
Within the Three Palaces, the network congeals; the nine orifices receive the new.
The spirit is keen in the hidden passes; within, one perceives without obstruction.
The body transforms and the form changes, merging with qi like smoke.
Riding the void, driving the empty, soar and ascend to the Thearch’s dawn.

When finished, swallow qi nine more times, then swallow saliva twenty-four times to conclude. Practicing this for three years, the bones transform into jade, the spirit rejoices and qi abounds; one may foreknow future events not yet manifest. After nine years, the form changes, and one soars through the Great Void.

In the first month, receive the qi of *Parīttābha* Heaven. On the fourth, fourteenth, and twenty-fourth days of the month, at dawn, noon, and midnight—three times in one month—bathe in fragrant water, enter the chamber, and burn incense. Face the northwest and bow nine times to the Primordial Father. Face the southeast and bow three times to the Mysterious Mother. Then, sit upright facing the lunar station, knock the teeth thirty-six times, close the eyes, and visualize the Heavenly King of *Parīttābha*, surnamed Radiance, named *Zhao Yi*, clad in a nine-colored, flowing-light, luminous-cloud brocade robe, wearing a *White Radiance Tai Bai Yujing* crown, riding a flying phoenix-drawn, rosy-cloud purple chariot, followed by thirty-six Jade Immortals of the Great Perfected, descending to enter the Canopy Palace within your body. Visualize white clouds swirling densely, crowning and enveloping your form. After a long while, draw the cloud-qi into your mouth and swallow it nine times, then softly intone:

The Three unite as One; the Nine Transformations congeal the spirit.
Above opens; below expands—the Two Radiances entwine.
Yin and Yang flourish within, descending to my body.
Qi is endowed by the Nine Numinous; my name is inscribed in the Lofty Dawn.
Within the Three Palaces, the purple network accords with nature’s pattern.
Within and without, all is thoroughly pervaded; the bones transform into immortals.
Returning qi and descending spirit, all the myriad spirits are fully possessed.
Wearing feathered robes, I am borne aloft to ascend the dawn.

When finished, swallow qi nine times, then swallow saliva twenty-four times to conclude. Practicing this for three years, the lungs transform into gold, and the face takes on a jade-like complexion. After nine years, the spirit descends, and one ascends in broad daylight.

In the second month, receive the qi of *Apramāṇa-śubha* Heaven. On the fifth, fifteenth, and twenty-fifth days of the month, at dawn, noon, and midnight—three times in one month—bathe in fragrant water, enter the chamber, and burn incense. Face the northwest and bow nine times to the Primordial Father. Face the southeast and bow three times to the Mysterious Mother. Then, sit upright facing the lunar station, knock the teeth thirty-six times, close the eyes, and visualize the Heavenly King of *Apramāṇa-śubha*, surnamed Congealment, named *Ning Yiwei*, clad in a nine-colored, flying-frost, cloud

When the three harmonize to form the warp, the two spirits intermingle in peace, the Nine Perfected descend in streams, sun and moon flank like wings, the Seven Stars cast their dark radiance, the Five Lodges revolve like a canopy, the Three Passes shine brightly, the myriad spirits don their regalia, the nine apertures are cleansed and unobstructed, the six palaces receive their irrigation, inner flourishing manifests outwardly, and one perceives all without boundary—thus abiding long with Heaven and Earth, eternally partaking of the Four Greatnesses. This done, swallow the qi nine times, and swallow the saliva nine times to conclude.

Practicing this for three years, the liver weaves into a purple network, jade-like luster emerges within, and inner and outer become luminously clear, allowing one to perceive the yet-unmanifest. After nine years, the spirit descends, and one ascends to the Nine Heavens in flight.

In the third month, receive the qi of *Jiran* Heaven. On the sixth, sixteenth, and twenty-sixth days of the month, at dawn, noon, and midnight—three times in one month—bathe in fragrant water, enter the chamber, and burn incense. Face the northwest and bow nine times to the Primordial Father. Face the southeast and bow three times to the Mysterious Mother. Then, sit upright facing the lunar station, knock the teeth thirty-six times, close the eyes, and visualize the Heavenly King of *Jiran*, surnamed *Jin*, named *Yanbi*, clad in a seven-colored, dragon-patterned, luminous robe, wearing a crown of yin-essence and night-light, riding an eight-scene flying chariot, accompanied by twelve jade immortals. Visualize them descending into the Longevity Palace within your body, seeing a verdant cloud of qi swirling densely around you. After a long while, draw the cloud-qi into the mouth and swallow it nine times, then softly intone:

The Supreme Dao is profound and obscure,
the mysterious qi subtly divides.
The Nine and Five flow forth,
the Eight Convergences command the Gate of Life.
In the Cinnabar Palace, the Red Child,
receiving qi from the Lord of the Empire,
holds the Peach of Longevity and the Register of Life,
presented to the Three Origins.
The host of perfected ones oversees and reflects,
refining the precious hun and po souls.
Inner freshness and outer radiance,
the spirit guards the hidden passes.
The Eight Scenes flank the body,
the Nine Qi descend with numinosity.
Soaring through the mysterious void,
one ascends to the Gate of the Emperor.

This done, swallow the qi nine times, and swallow the saliva nine times to conclude.

Practicing this for three years, the gallbladder transforms into jade frost, and purple mist congeals within. The nine apertures receive the spirit, allowing one to converse with the Red Child. After nine years, one obtains a purple canopy of dark clouds and ascends to the Nine Heavens.

In the fourth month, receive the qi of *Xuyan* Heaven. On the seventh, seventeenth, and twenty-seventh days of the month, at dawn, noon, and midnight—three times in one month—bathe in fragrant water, enter the chamber, and burn incense. Face the northwest and bow nine times to the Primordial Father. Face the southeast and bow three times to the Mysterious Mother. Then, sit upright facing the lunar station, knock the teeth thirty-six times, close the eyes, and visualize the Heavenly King of *Xuyan*, surnamed *Zi*, named *Yanbin*, clad in a nine-colored robe adorned with the patterns of the Three Dharmas, wearing a crown of Heavenly Origin and precious brightness, riding a nine-colored flying swan and three-pure flying clouds, accompanied by twenty-four jade maidens of pure spirit. Visualize them descending into the Yellow Court within your body, seeing a yellow cloud of qi swirling densely around you. After a long while, draw the cloud-qi into the mouth and swallow it nine times, then softly intone:

The three hun are now at peace,
the seven po now tranquil.
Heaven arrays the Five Lodges,
the body models the Seven Stars.
The myriad spirits attend as wings,
the mysterious perfected exhale their numinosity.
Jade mushrooms flow and pour,
thoroughly irrigating the five forms.
Inner fullness and outer overflow,
the hidden passes shine clearly.
Returning to refine the marrow,
reverting from white to green,
one roams the scenes with transformations,
exiting the hidden and entering the obscure,
riding the void to fly through space,
ascending to the Moon’s Court.

This done, swallow the qi nine times, and swallow the saliva nine times to conclude.

Practicing this for three years, the spleen transforms into gold, and the body emits golden essence. One beholds the five viscera and converses with the Eight Scenes. After nine years, one soars in flight and ascends to the Jade Clarity.

In the fifth month, receive the qi of *Shangshang Chan Shan Wuliang Shou* Heaven. On the eighth, eighteenth, and twenty-eighth days of the month, at dawn, noon, and midnight—three times in one month—bathe in fragrant water, enter the chamber, and burn incense. Face the northwest and bow nine times to the Primordial Father. Face the southeast and bow three times to the Mysterious Mother. Then, sit upright facing the lunar station, knock the teeth thirty-six times, close the eyes, and visualize the Heavenly King of *Shangshang Chan Shan Wuliang Shou*, surnamed *Xi*, named *Yannan*, clad in a nine-colored cloud-patterned robe, wearing a crown of luminous essence and moonlight, riding twelve dark turtles and a flying azure feathered canopy, accompanied by thirty-two jade lads of the Upper Palace. Visualize them descending into the Double Union Palace within your body, seeing a purple cloud of qi swirling densely around you. After a long while, draw the cloud-qi into the mouth and swallow it nine times, then softly intone:

The Eight Scenes array their positions,
the myriad spirits align in order.
The five viscera blossom,
the nine apertures shine clearly.
The heart transforms into a king,
the bones turn to flying dust.
Rosy skirts flutter,
feathered capes drift like mist.
The inner perfected surge,
flying in azure feathered robes.
Cloud chariots and purple canopies,
jade carriages return.
Conveying the immortal to soar,
winding and circling,
I request to ascend in flight,
rising to the Supreme Subtlety.

This done, swallow the qi nine times, and swallow the saliva nine times to conclude.

Practicing this for three years, the kidneys transform and congeal into an immortal form, the entire body perfected. The Three Origins descend, and one ascends to Heaven in broad daylight.

In the sixth month, receive the qi of *Yudan Wuliang* Heaven. On the ninth, nineteenth, and twenty-ninth days of the month, at dawn, noon, and midnight—three times in one month—bathe in fragrant water, enter the chamber, and burn incense. Face the northwest and bow nine times to the Primordial Father. Face the southeast and bow three times to the Mysterious Mother. Then, sit upright facing the lunar station, knock the teeth thirty-six times, close the eyes, and visualize the Heavenly King of *Yudan Wuliang*, surnamed *Hun*, named *Shuangnan*, clad in a nine-colored, seamless, naturally patterned robe, wearing a crown of radiant essence and solar roundness, riding a nine-unicorn jade chariot, accompanied by twenty-four jade immortals. Visualize them descending into the Crimson Palace within your body, seeing a crimson cloud of qi swirling densely around you. After a long while, draw the cloud-qi into the mouth and swallow it nine times, then softly intone:

The qi of the Nine Heavens now fills and suffuses me, arraying the Eight Effulgences and ordering the Three Palaces. The ten thousand spirits take their stations, and numinous perfected ones commune; the Director of Destinies fixes my register, while the Great One lends support. The Three and the Five align in harmony, and I behold the revolutions of the Great Yang. Through three transformations and nine revolutions, I return to my imperial homeland. A golden chariot with a jade canopy, flanked by jade radiance, descends upon my body, settling within my Golden Hall. It guards me, accompanies me, and soars with me—ascending through the Great Mystery to feast in the Imperial Chamber.

When this is complete, swallow the qi nine times, and swallow the saliva nine times to conclude.

After three years of such practice, a jade blossom blooms within the heart, and the ten thousand qi transform into immortality. One perceives the hidden and scrutinizes the obscure, conversing with spirits as equals. After nine years, one rides the Eight Effulgences and soars into the Upper Clarity.

From the tenth month of conception to the sixth month, the qi of the Nine Heavens is fully received. By the seventh month, combined with the tenth, the qi of Heaven and Earth reach fullness, and one is born through the revolutions of the Great Yang. Thus, on the tenth day at dawn, the twentieth day at noon, and the thirtieth day at midnight—three times each month—bathe in fragrant water, enter the chamber, and burn incense. Face the northwest and bow nine times, then turn to the southeast and bow three times. Return to sit upright facing your natal destiny, knock the teeth thirty-six times, and visualize the Primordial Father of the Nine Heavens, whose tabooed name is *Zunhui*, descending from the northwest of Heaven into the Muddy Pellet Palace within your body. Visualize the Mysterious Mother, whose tabooed name is *Dunhuan*, descending from the southeast of Heaven into the Gate of Destiny within your Elixir Field.

The Primordial Father transforms into azure qi, descending from the Muddy Pellet Palace, while the Mysterious Mother transforms into yellow qi, ascending from the Gate of Destiny. The two qi converge within the Crimson Palace, blending into a golden hue and intertwining. In an instant, the azure qi becomes an infant, and the yellow qi becomes a phoenix. The phoenix holds in its beak the talisman of *Nine Elixirs Flowing Essence for Preserving Life*, feeding it to the infant’s mouth. Once the infant receives the talisman, it transforms into a round sun, emerging above the head, while the phoenix becomes a lunar effulgence, returning to the Gate of Destiny. The radiance of the sun and moon shine upon each other from afar, illuminating the entire body. Then, draw the essence of the sun eighty-one times and the light of the moon forty-five times, softly intoning:

Above, it transforms the hidden depths; below, it illumines the form with the Great Yang. The two qi unite and converge in the Crimson Palace. The Primordial transforms into an infant, the Mysterious into a phoenix—now separating, now merging, through nine transformations blending into gold. The sun and moon face each other, communicating above and below. The Imperial Spirit guards the left, while Peach Prosperity wings the right. White Prime and Limitless Flourishing abide in the Grotto Chamber. The ten thousand spirits gather in splendor, teeming and vast. Ascending and descending, they circulate essence, inwardly crystallizing jade radiance. Externally and internally, they display their feathered regalia. A dragon chariot arrives to welcome me, soaring through the Mysterious Void to ascend into the Great Emptiness.

When this is complete, ingest the talisman of *Nine Elixirs Flowing Essence for Preserving Life*. Then, swallow the qi nine times and the saliva nine times to conclude.

After three years of such practice, the Perfected One appears in form, the face bearing a golden countenance, the body emanating wondrous light. After nine years, one soars aloft and ascends to Heaven in broad daylight.

**The Talisman of Nine Elixirs Flowing Essence for Preserving Life**
Inscribed in azure on bamboo membrane, face your natal destiny and ingest three talismans at the three periods of the day. This penetrates the abdomen, refines the marrow, transforms the bones, and coalesces the spirit. After three years, the entire body undergoes transmutation.

Before ingesting the talisman, intone:
Heaven descends and Earth ascends; the two qi intermingle in abundance. The Nine Elixirs transform and change, crystallizing essence within the central chamber. The Eight Effulgences scatter their numinosity, and the Six Palaces flourish within. The ten thousand spirits unite in purity, eternally enjoying the Great Intestine. They traverse the ends of Heaven and Earth, their joy unending.

When this is complete, ingest the talisman and swallow the nine qi to conclude.

In practicing this Dao, one must calculate the months of gestation and proceed accordingly, completing the full ten months. This is the *Record of Embryonic Essence within the Womb*, the root of immortal study and the wellspring of seeking life. Without this Dao, one’s diligence is in vain, bringing no benefit to body or spirit. If the body is not refined and the root of karma remains unsevered, the true spirit wanders astray. Even if cloud chariots descend, the body cannot ascend of its own accord.

This is the most secret of Dao, to be cautiously imparted only to the truly devoted. The covenant is solemn, and violations bring calamity upon oneself. Through secret cultivation and earnest devotion, one may attain transcendence and ascend to Heaven in broad daylight.

If the month of conception is unknown, use the month of one’s natal destiny as the gestational month and proceed accordingly. For example, if one’s natal destiny is in the first month (tiger), then the first month is the gestational month. Others should follow this model.

The *Record of Embryonic Essence Transformed by the Nine Elixirs* is also called *Luminous Womb of the Jade Embryo*. It arises at the inception of the Nine Mysteries, crystallizing the natural qi of the Great Emptiness to form its precious script. The Twenty-Four Perfected and the Thirty-Nine Emperors all practiced this method. The Supreme Thearch transmitted it to the Lady of the Southern Culmen, who transmitted it to the Thearch of the Grand Tenuity. The Thearch of the Grand Tenuity transmitted it to the Golden Portal Thearch of Later Saints, who transmitted it to the Azure Lad of the Supreme Minister. The Azure Lad compiled and arranged its sequence of practice, entrusting it to the Perfected One of the Western City. The Queen Mother of the West has now sealed one copy on Mount Fangzhang in Yingzhou.

According to the statutes, those whose bones align with immortality after seven thousand years—whose names are recorded in the imperial register—may receive this transmission. In the present era, within seven hundred years, it may be transmitted three times. Those who obtain this text are attended by nine jade lads and nine jade maidens, who guard and protect the practitioner’s body.

To treat the sacred text with disrespect, transmit it to the unworthy, or reveal celestial secrets brings retribution upon one’s seven generations of ancestors, who are punished by the Three Officials. They are condemned to carry stones and pile mountains for ten thousand kalpas without reprieve. One’s own body is subjected to trial, eternally confined to the earthly prisons, barred from entering immortality.

When transmitting this scripture, master and disciple must face each other in a fast for ninety days, or at least thirty days. The disciple must offer one catty of gold, eighty feet of white silk, and one catty of elixir as tokens of the covenant’s sincerity. Kneeling and facing north, they swear the oath before transmission.

This must not be lightly transmitted. Without covenant or sincerity, practicing this Dao brings calamity upon the seven mysteries, and one’s own body bears the punishment. Burdened with guilt, one wanders the dark night for ten thousand kalpas without reprieve. Practitioners must be prudent and cautious, never recklessly divulging this teaching.

The *Upper Clarity Scripture of the Nine Elixirs and the Record of Embryonic Essence Transformation in the Central Realm of Refinement* concludes. #1 The characters "Table of Contents" were added by the editor.

chunks.original_text: 上清九丹上化胎精中记经 经名：上清九丹上化胎精中记经。 简称《胎精中记经》。 撰人不详，约出於东晋。 系早期上清派重要经典。 一卷。 底本出处：《正统道藏》正一部。 上清九丹上化胎精中记经 一名九天琼胎灵曜 目录#1 上化九丹阳灵之符 胎精炼神之符 三关十二结胞胎内符 九丹流精保命之符 九丹上化之文，太微帝君授於三天玉童，乃上化九转回精凝神，解散紫胞结节之根，还精哺饴灵镇穷肠，内充外溢九窍鲜明，炼髓易骨节节纳真。 其法高妙，秘於九天金房玉室灵都之宫，依四极明科，万劫一传。 自无玄名紫简，绿字上清，不得参闻。 有犯灵禁，伐以神兵，密修道感，白日飞仙。 九天丈人告三天玉童：天地交运，二象合真，阴阳降气，上应九玄，流丹九转，结气为精，精化成神，神变成人。 故人象天地，气法自然。 自然之气，皆九天之精，化为人身，含胎育养，九月气盈，九天气普，十月乃生。 其结胎受化，有吉有凶，有寿有夭，有短有长，皆禀宿根结气不纯，藏胃积滞，六府败伤，形神不固，体不受灵，死气入窍，何由得存。 徒知修学，不识此源。 今以相告，一形之真，随生解结，哺养百神，体自生光，内府鲜明，神安宫宅，万气并仙。 子其秘之，慎勿轻宣。 凡人受生，结九丹上化於胞胎之中，法九天之气，气满神具，便於胞囊之内，而自识其宿命，知有本根，转轮因缘九天之劫，化成其身。 既睹阳道，开旷三光，而自忘其所生所由之因。 尔者皆由胞根结滞，盘固三关，五府不理，死气塞门，致灵关不发，而忘其因缘也。 若灵真托化，含炼琼胎，暂经紫户，运履人道，挺秀自然，曜景睹灵，便腾身九天，非复结精受气而为人也。 凡修学之家，仰希神仙，当知炼身於九丹，解结於五神，引气於本生，灭根於三门，九炼十变，百节开明，断灭胞结，乃知本真，既知本真，便成上仙。 学无此法，三宫不聪，死气不灭，胃不受灵，气离神游，赤子不欢，宫宅空废，邪魔入身，所以百痾从此而生，死不尽命，痛胡可言。 阳气赤，名曰玄丹。 阴气黄，名曰黄精。 阴阳交，二气降，精化神结，上应九天。 九天之气则下布丹田，与精合凝，结会命门，要须九过，是为九丹，上化下凝，以成於人。 一月受气，二月受灵，三月含变，四月凝精，五月体首具，六月化形，七月神位布，八月九孔明，九月九天气普，乃有音声，十月司命勒籍，受命而生。 故人禀九天之气，阴阳之精，名曰九丹，合成人身。 既得为人，便应返其本真，通理五藏，解散胞根，断灭死孔，自然成仙也。 凡人生在胞胎之中，皆禀九天之气，凝精以自成人也。 既生而胞中有十二结节，盘固五内，五内滞阂，结不可解，节不可灭。 故人之病，由於节滞也。 人之命绝，由於结固也。 兆能解於胞中十二结节，则求死亦不得也。 胞上部有四结，一结在泥丸中，二结在口中，三结在颊中，四结在目中。 欲解上部四结，当以本命之日平旦，入室烧香，向西北九拜，朝九天元父，叩齿九通，三呼元父讳遵回； 向东南三拜，三呼九天玄母讳沌还。 向本命平坐，闭眼思元父，身长九寸九分，着玄黄素灵之绶，头戴九称珠玉之积，无极进贤之冠，居九天之上太极琼宫，玉宝之府丹灵乡洞元里中，乘碧霞飞舆，从十二飞龙，二十四仙人，从西北来下，入我身中，治泥丸之境。

**The Upper Clarity Scripture on the Nine Elixirs and the Transformation of Embryonic Essence: Central Record**

**Scripture Title:** *The Upper Clarity Scripture on the Nine Elixirs and the Transformation of Embryonic Essence: Central Record* (abbreviated as *Central Record of Embryonic Essence*).

Author unknown, approximately dated to the Eastern Jin dynasty. A foundational scripture of the early Shangqing (Upper Clarity) tradition. One fascicle.

**Source:** *Daoist Canon of the Zhengtong Era*, Orthodox Section, Part One.

**The Upper Clarity Scripture on the Nine Elixirs and the Transformation of Embryonic Essence: Central Record** (alternate title: *Nine Heavens’ Jade Embryo and Numinous Radiance*)

**Table of Contents #1**
- Talisman of the Nine Elixirs’ Yang Spirit for Upper Transformation
- Talisman of Embryonic Essence for Refining the Spirit
- Talisman of the Three Passes and Twelve Knots within the Embryonic Sac
- Talisman of the Nine Elixirs’ Flowing Essence for Preserving Life

The text of the *Nine Elixirs’ Upper Transformation* was bestowed by the Lord Emperor of the Grand Tenuity upon the Jade Lads of the Three Heavens. It enables the ninefold cyclical refinement of essence, the return of spirit, the dissolution of the purple embryonic knots, and the nourishment of the primordial orifices with flowing essence. Internally, it fills the marrow; externally, it overflows through the nine apertures, brightening them. The bones are refined, and each joint receives the true. Its method is lofty and wondrous, concealed within the Golden Chamber and Jade Abode of the Nine Heavens’ Numinous Capital. According to the *Luminous Statutes of the Four Poles*, it is transmitted but once in ten thousand kalpas. Only those whose names are inscribed in the Purple Registers of the Upper Clarity in green script may partake of its teachings. Whoever violates its sacred prohibitions shall be smitten by divine soldiers. Those who cultivate it in secret and attain the Dao shall ascend as immortals in broad daylight.

The Venerable Person of the Nine Heavens addressed the Jade Lads of the Three Heavens: "When heaven and earth exchange their revolutions, the two images merge into the true. Yin and yang descend their qi, corresponding above to the Nine Mysteries. The flowing elixir undergoes nine transformations, congealing qi into essence. Essence transforms into spirit, and spirit metamorphoses into humanity. Thus, humans mirror heaven and earth, and their qi follows the natural. The qi of the natural is the essence of the Nine Heavens, which, when transformed into the human body, is contained, nurtured, and nourished within the embryo. After nine months, the qi is full; the qi of the Nine Heavens is pervasive. In the tenth month, birth occurs. The formation of the embryo and its transformation may be auspicious or inauspicious, long-lived or short-lived, for these depend on the purity of the karmic roots and the congealed qi. If the viscera accumulate stagnation and the six palaces suffer damage, the form and spirit will not be firm, and the body will not receive the numinous. When the qi of death enters the orifices, how can one endure? Many engage in cultivation and study yet remain ignorant of this origin. Now, I reveal it to you: the true of a single form, when born, dissolves its knots, nourishes the hundred spirits, and the body naturally radiates light. The inner palaces become luminous, the spirit rests in its abode, and the myriad qi ascend as immortals. Guard this secret; do not lightly disclose it.

All who receive life form the nine elixirs’ upper transformation within the embryonic sac, following the qi of the Nine Heavens. When the qi is full and the spirit complete, they recognize within the embryonic membrane their past lives, know their original roots, and comprehend the karmic cycles of the Nine Heavens’ kalpas that shaped their bodies. Yet upon beholding the yang path and the vastness of the Three Luminaries, they forget the causes of their birth and origin. This arises from the stagnation of the embryonic roots, the blockage of the Three Passes, the disorder of the five palaces, and the obstruction of the gates by the qi of death, preventing the numinous passes from opening and causing the forgetting of karmic causes. If a numinous perfected one entrusts transformation, refining the jade embryo and briefly passing through the purple portal, treading the human path, they emerge naturally radiant, beholding the numinous with luminous splendor. They then ascend bodily to the Nine Heavens, no longer bound to the cycle of congealing essence and receiving qi to become human.

Those who cultivate and study, aspiring to immortality, must refine the body with the nine elixirs, dissolve the knots of the five spirits, guide qi to its original birth, and extinguish the roots at the Three Gates. After nine refinements and ten transformations, the hundred joints become luminous. Once the embryonic knots are severed and the original true is known, one becomes an immortal of the highest rank. Without this method, the Three Palaces remain dull, the qi of death is not extinguished, the stomach does not receive the numinous, qi departs and spirit wanders, the Red Child is not joyful, the palaces lie abandoned, and demonic influences enter the body. Thus, the hundred ailments arise, life is not fulfilled, and the pain is beyond words.

Yang qi is red and is called the Mysterious Elixir. Yin qi is yellow and is called Yellow Essence. When yin and yang intersect and the two qi descend, essence transforms and spirit congeals, corresponding above to the Nine Heavens. The qi of the Nine Heavens then descends to fill the cinnabar field, merging with essence to congeal and unite at the Gate of Life. After nine cycles, this becomes the Nine Elixirs. Through upper transformation and lower congealment, a human is formed. In the first month, qi is received; in the second, the numinous; in the third, transformation is contained; in the fourth, essence congeals; in the fifth, the body and head take shape; in the sixth, the form is transformed; in the seventh, the spirit’s positions are arrayed; in the eighth, the nine orifices become bright; in the ninth, the qi of the Nine Heavens pervades, and sound emerges; in the tenth, the Director of Destinies inscribes the register, and life is received at birth. Thus, humans receive the qi of the Nine Heavens and the essence of yin and yang, called the Nine Elixirs, which together form the human body. Once born as human, one should return to the original true, regulate the five viscera, dissolve the embryonic roots, and sever the gates of death to naturally become an immortal.

All who are born within the embryonic sac receive the qi of the Nine Heavens, congealing essence to form the human body. Yet within the embryo, there are twelve knots that coil around the five viscera, causing stagnation and blockage, knots that cannot be dissolved, and nodes that cannot be extinguished. Thus, human illness arises from the stagnation of nodes, and the end of life comes from the fixation of knots. If one can dissolve the twelve embryonic knots, even the desire for death will be unattainable.

The upper part of the embryo has four knots: the first knot lies within the Muddy Pellet (brain), the second in the mouth, the third in the cheeks, and the fourth in the eyes. To dissolve the four upper knots, on the day of one’s original destiny at dawn, enter a chamber, burn incense, and bow nine times toward the northwest, facing the Primordial Father of the Nine Heavens. Strike the teeth nine times, and thrice invoke the taboo name of the Primordial Father, *Zunhui*. Then bow three times toward the southeast, thrice invoking the taboo name of the Mysterious Mother of the Nine Heavens, *Dunhuan*. Sit upright according to your original destiny, close your eyes, and visualize the Primordial Father: his body is nine inches and nine fen tall, clad in a sash of dark yellow and plain numinous silk. He wears a crown of accumulated nine-tiered pearls and jade, the *Wujijinxian* cap, and resides in the Jade Capital of the Supreme Ultimate within the Nine Heavens, the Treasure Palace of the Cinnabar Numinous Realm in the Cavern of Primordial Purity. He rides a flying chariot of azure radiance, attended by twelve flying dragons and twenty-four immortals, descending from the northwest to enter your body and govern the realm of the Muddy Pellet."
