Next visualize the Mysterious Mother: her body is six inches and six fen tall, clad in a sash of azure treasure, divine radiance, brocade, frost-silk, and nine-colored essence. She wears a crown of purple origin and dark yellow treasure, residing above the Nine Qi and the Ultimate Non-Ultimate, within the Sevenfold Radiance of the Jasper Grove, the Cinnabar Chamber of the Jade Treasure, the Cavern of Primordial Purity, the Ninefold Radiance Realm, and the Upper Clarity Precinct. She rides a flying canopy of purple clouds and refined feathered shade, attended by ten supreme phoenixes and thirty-six jade maidens, descending from the southeast to enter your body and govern the Cavern Chamber of the face.

Visualize the Father and Mother transforming into blue and yellow qi, coiling and intertwining, vying above your head and face. When complete, strike the teeth nine times and softly intone:

*"I, [your name], receive the transformation of the Nine Numinosities, yet my qi remains impure, my nodes stagnant and coiled, sealing the numinous gates. Reverently, by my original destiny, I report above to the Lofty Dawn’s Primordial Father and Mysterious Mother, and below to my own body. May the Eight Radiant Scenes shine as one, the Nine Heavens unite in truth, jointly dissolving the four upper knots of the womb-root. May the numinous turn back to guard the gates, the nine apertures knit into immortality, the inner embryo refined and transformed, the Nine Elixirs congeal the spirit, blue transmuted into red, the two qi entwined. May my life span equal the Three Luminaries, and my years endure for countless eons."*

When finished, swallow qi eighty-one times and cease.

Then visualize the King of *Yudan* Immeasurable Heaven, surnamed *Hun*, taboo name *Shuangnianchu*, clad in a nine-colored, seamless, naturally patterned robe, wearing a crown of radiant essence and solar roundness. He governs within the Boundless Dark Terrace and Purple Gate of Heaven, riding a nine-mountain jade wheel, attended by twenty-four jade immortals.

Next visualize the King of *Shangshang Chanshan* Immeasurable Longevity Heaven, surnamed *Xi*, taboo name *Yanniannan*, clad in a nine-colored cloud-patterned robe, wearing a crown of luminous essence and lunar radiance. He governs the Kingdom of Heavenly Kings, the Seven Treasures of the Vermilion Grove, and the Jasper Terrace, riding a twelvefold dark turtle and flying azure feathered canopy, attended by thirty-two jade lads of the Upper Palace.

Next visualize the King of *Xuyan* Heaven, surnamed *Zi*, taboo name *Niannaichu*, clad in a nine-colored robe of the Three Dharma Clouds, wearing a crown of Heavenly Origin and Jade Treasure. He governs the Jade Capital and Numinous Metropolis Palace of Heaven, riding a nine-colored flying swan and threefold plain flying clouds, attended by twenty-four jade maidens of pure numinosity.

Visualize the Three Heavenly True Kings descending above your head and face, transforming into blue, purple, and yellow qi, chaotic as intertwining clouds. They enter through the mouth, ears, and nostrils, encircling your entire face. Then look up and intone:

*"Great Kings of the Three Heavens, Ninefold Mysterious Numinous Immortals, dissolve for me the knots and barriers of my head and face. Transform the Nine Elixirs naturally, descending upon the Golden Gate of Essence. Intermingle the clouds of the Three Perfected, flowing into my body to perfect my spirit. Scour away the qi of death, extinguish the womb-root, secure the numinous radiance, and cast off all baleful afflictions. May each knot be untied, each node receive the true, the dark radiance flow and spread, deeply irrigating the hidden springs. Proclaim my name to the Nine Heavens, return the embryo to immortality, inwardly replete and outwardly full, within and without become spirit."*

When finished, swallow qi nine times and cease.

Next visualize the Eight Radiant Lads of the Upper Realm.

With eyes closed, visualize the brain spirit, named *Awareness Primordial Lad*, styled *Dao Capital*, one inch and one fen tall, clad in white brocade, wearing a three-ridge treasure crown.

The hair spirit, named *Mysterious Father Hua*, styled *Dao Balance*, two inches and one fen tall, clad in dark cloud brocade, wearing a *Wujijinxian* cap.

The skin spirit, named *Permeating Multitude Second*, styled *Dao Link*, one inch and five fen tall, clad in a yellow brocade flying skirt, wearing a Three Qi Treasure Heaven Crown.

The eye spirit, named *Void Supervisor Born*, styled *Dao Lad*, three inches tall, clad in five-colored patterned robes, wearing a *Tongtian* crown.

The neck marrow spirit, named *Numinous Plan Cover*, styled *Dao Circumference*, five inches tall, clad in a white brocade plain skirt, wearing a three-ridge treasure crown.

The spine spirit, named *Benefit Calendar Auxiliary*, styled *Dao Pillar*, three inches and five fen tall, clad in soft white jade robes, wearing a *Xuanyuan* treasure crown.

The nose spirit, named *Surging Dragon Jade*, styled *Dao Subtle*, two inches and five fen tall, clad in azure-yellow plain brocade flying skirt, wearing a *Yuanyou* crown.

The tongue spirit, named *Beginning Ridge Peak*, styled *Dao Fork*, seven inches tall, clad in crimson brocade flying skirt, wearing a *Jinxian* cap.

When the Eight Radiant Scenes are complete, all resemble infants, gathered upon the face, each settled in its place. Then strike the teeth eight times and softly intone:

*"Upper Radiance, one realm, eight spirits unite the true. The qi of the Nine Elixirs transforms and perfects my body. A thousand chariots, ten thousand riders, like clouds dispersing and mist scattering, descend to encircle my head and face, bestowing numinosity and arraying spirit. Above, dissolve the knots and nodes; within, extinguish the womb-root; below, remove the fixed stagnations. Unblock and regulate the Three Passes. The Eight Radiant Scenes guard and protect, sharing the same age as the numinous. The Imperial Lord and Mysterious Mother, turning back to the Lofty Dawn, descend their jade splendor, halting my withered freshness. Return my countenance to crimson, my face to golden immortality. Transform the radiance to pursue lightning, directly entering the Gate of the Sun."*

When finished, swallow qi eight times, then cease, and ingest the talisman of the Upper Transmutation’s Nine Elixirs and Yang Numinosity.

**Talisman of the Upper Transmutation’s Nine Elixirs and Yang Numinosity**
Inscribed in cinnabar on blue paper, three copies.

At high noon, face your original destiny, strike the teeth nine times, and softly intone:

*"Upper Transmutation of the Nine Qi, refining and transforming the hundred spirits. Within, govern the Six Palaces; without, descend the Great Immortals. The Mysterious Mother crafts the essences, dissolving knots and dispersing stagnations, severing and extinguishing the womb-root. The body becomes light, the flesh flies, responding to qi naturally, ascending with qi to stand before the Emperor."*

chunks.original_text: 两胁神，名辟假马，字道成，形长四寸一分，衣赤白二色之裙，头戴九元宝冠； 左阴右阳中神，名扶流起，字道圭，形长二寸三分，衣青黄白三色之裙，头戴远游之冠； 右阴左阳中神，名苞表明，字道生，形长二寸三分，衣青黄白三色之裙，头戴三梁之冠。 存八景都毕，并如婴儿之状，各安所在，千乘万骑，匝布在我阴中、膀胱、后门、两足之中，仍叩齿八通，仰祝曰： 下部八景，散形变神，含元育气，炼胎紫烟，太一元父，玄母交缠，二精流灌，含养内真，帝君定籍，司命改年，节结已散，九孔已鲜，魂魄保固，总摄万神，与我同升，俱造玉晨。 毕，仰咽液八过止。 又思道一内神，名逮无马，字道极生，形长二寸二分，衣紫文明光锦裙，头戴无极进贤之冠，在兆脐下丹田之中，总统三部二十四真。 叩齿三十二通，微祝曰： 玄上大神，总领无外，安镇幽谷，流精紫盖，众真侍灵，三部交卫，帝君映席，玄母欢奉，九元同符，司命延迈，三晨齐晖，与真结带。 毕，仰咽二十四气，都止，便服三关十二结胞胎内符。 三关十二结胞胎内符 右朱书竹膜上，三枚，存思都毕，向太岁上服之，微祝曰： 上部四结，固人泥丸，落人华容，夭人生繁，中部四结，合凶为群，盘固太仓，迅人游魂，来祆通奸，景梦不专，下部四结，结人后门，遏人九孔，断人命根； 帝君告灵，九天五文，消解给节，灭诸根源，元父玄母，育养三关，八景镇备，真气散分，上清下黄，外方内圆，表裹齐清，降致三元，得乘八景，飞霄流云，腾空驾虚，上造金门。 毕，仰咽十二气，咽二十四过，都止。 本命日平旦、正中、夜半三时，解三部十二结节，八节日亦应行之，以兼其速求仙之近也。 八节修行，亦同三时之存思也，行之三年，面生玉光，体映金真，肉消骨轻，内化结仙，九年灵降，白日升天。 学无此法，徒劳精勤，死结不散，盘滞日缠，神气不布，祆邪入身，游魂飞散，何由得仙。 有心至士，熟寻此源，三时解结，克获上仙。 返胎琼秀，三关纳真，三部八景，二十四神，千乘万骑，同御紫烟。 高上妙化，玉帝灵篇，妄传轻泄，殃及七玄，死魂充责，长没河源，己身负考，三涂五苦，万劫不原，学者慎之，秘识此言。 二景之神，皆九天化生之精神也。 元父上化，玄母结胎，九天育养，以成於人，二十四人，各备灵关。 兆欲修学，不知存念其形，则神游气散，死气结沈，祆魔入景，促命夭年。 若知修行，解散三关，神安宫宅，灵镇玉门，结节自消，死气自亡，万神齐景，则白日升天。 凡人生皆禀九天之气，气凝为精，精化成丹，丹变成人，结胎含孕，法於自然。 既得为人，当还哺养本真，使精溢六府，气降神庭，内外光鲜，与真同灵。 此法高妙，不传下仙，修得其道，返白停年，寿齐三景，天地相倾，妄泄其要，考切尔身。 凡上学之士，莫不先解身中三关之结。 解结之道，又当常以结胎之月，哺养本元，令死节沈消，九真镇灵，真气既降，则自长生，气像相应，则不学而成。 行此道，假令七月生，则十月胎，十月胎，则受波梨答和天之气，当以十月一日平旦、十一日正中、二十一日夜半，一月三日三时，香汤沐浴，烧香，依其日时入室，向西北九拜，朝九天元父，东南三拜，朝九天玄母，还向月建平坐，叩齿三十六通，闭眼思波梨答和天王，姓玉，讳灵雾，衣九色无缝玄云宝裘，头戴无极流黄填星飞精之冠，乘五色云舆，从太玄玉童十二人，来下入兆身中，镇泥丸宫。

The spirits of the two flanks, named *Pi Jia Ma*, styled *Dao Cheng*, four inches and one fen in height, clad in a skirt of red and white, wearing a *Jiuyuan Baoguan* crown.

The spirit of the left yin and right yang, named *Fu Liu Qi*, styled *Dao Gui*, two inches and three fen in height, clad in a skirt of blue, yellow, and white, wearing a *Yuanyou* crown.

The spirit of the right yin and left yang, named *Bao Biao Ming*, styled *Dao Sheng*, two inches and three fen in height, clad in a skirt of blue, yellow, and white, wearing a three-ridged crown.

When the Eight Radiant Assemblies are fully visualized, all appear in the form of infants, each settled in their place. A thousand chariots and ten thousand riders fill my yin, bladder, posterior gate, and the spaces within my two feet. Then, knock the teeth eight times and raise a prayer, saying:

*"The Eight Radiant Ones of the lower region, scattered in form and transformed in spirit, embrace the primordial and nurture qi. They refine the fetal purple mist. The Primordial Father of Grand Unity and the Mysterious Mother entwine. The two essences flow and irrigate, containing and nourishing the inner perfected ones. The Imperial Lord establishes the register; the Controller of Destiny alters the years. The knotted joints disperse; the nine apertures become fresh. The hun and po are preserved and secured. The ten thousand spirits are gathered and governed, ascending with me together to reach the Jade Dawn."*

When finished, swallow saliva eight times and stop.

Next, visualize the inner spirit of the Dao’s unity, named *Dai Wu Ma*, styled *Dao Jisheng*, two inches and two fen in height, clad in a skirt of purple brocade adorned with luminous patterns, wearing a *Wuji Jinxian* crown. He resides in the Cinnabar Field below the navel, governing the Three Regions and the Twenty-Four Perfected Ones.

Knock the teeth thirty-two times and softly pray, saying:

*"Great spirit of the Mysterious Above, governing all without exception, settling and guarding the hidden valley, flowing essence beneath the purple canopy. The host of perfected ones attend in spirit; the Three Regions exchange protection. The Imperial Lord illumines the seat; the Mysterious Mother rejoices in offering. The Nine Origins unite in accord; the Controller of Destiny extends the journey. The Three Dawns shine together, binding with the perfected in a sash."*

When finished, swallow the twenty-four breaths, then stop and ingest the Inner Talisman of the Three Passes and Twelve Knotted Fetal Bonds.

**Inner Talisman of the Three Passes and Twelve Knotted Fetal Bonds**
Write in red on bamboo membrane, three slips. After completing the visualization, face the Year-Star and ingest them, softly praying:

*"The four knots of the upper region solidify the Muddy Pellet; they cast one into the flowery countenance and cut short one’s flourishing years. The four knots of the middle region gather misfortune into a flock, coiling and binding the Great Granary, hastening the wandering hun. Malevolent influences and treachery penetrate; radiant dreams are not steadfast. The four knots of the lower region bind the posterior gate, obstruct the nine apertures, and sever the root of life.

The Imperial Lord proclaims the numinous; the Five Scripts of the Nine Heavens dissolve and unbind the joints, extinguishing all roots and sources. The Primordial Father and Mysterious Mother nurture and nourish the Three Passes. The Eight Radiant Ones guard and prepare; true qi scatters and distributes. Above is clear, below is yellow; outside is square, inside is round. Exterior and interior are equally pure, descending to summon the Three Origins. Attaining the Eight Radiant Ones, one rides the clouds of dawn and soars through the void, ascending to the Golden Gate."*

When finished, swallow twelve breaths, then swallow twenty-four times, and stop.

On one’s natal day, at the three hours of dawn, noon, and midnight, dissolve the twelve knotted joints of the Three Regions. On the eight seasonal nodes, this practice should also be performed to hasten the nearness of immortality.

Cultivating on the eight nodes follows the same visualization as the three hours. Practicing this for three years, one’s face will radiate jade light, the body will reflect golden perfection, flesh will diminish, bones will become light, and the inner knots will transform into an immortal. After nine years, the numinous descends, and one ascends to heaven in broad daylight.

Those who study without this method labor in vain. The knots remain undissolved, coiled and entangled day by day. Spirit and qi do not spread; malevolent influences enter the body. The wandering hun scatter—how can one attain immortality?

Sincere and devoted scholars must diligently seek this source. Dissolving the knots at the three hours, one will surely attain the highest immortality.

The *Returning Womb’s Jade Splendor* gathers the Three Passes and receives the perfected. The Three Regions and Eight Radiant Ones, the Twenty-Four Spirits, a thousand chariots and ten thousand riders, together ride the purple mist.

The sublime and wondrous transformation, the *Numinous Writ of the Jade Emperor*—if rashly transmitted or lightly divulged, calamity will extend to the seven ancestors. The dead souls will fill the debt, forever submerged in the river’s source. One’s own person will bear the punishment, suffering the Three Paths and Five Torments, for ten thousand kalpas without release. Scholars, be cautious and guard these words in secret.

The spirits of the Two Radiant Ones are all the transformed spiritual essences of the Nine Heavens. The Primordial Father transforms above; the Mysterious Mother forms the womb. The Nine Heavens nurture and rear, completing the human being. The Twenty-Four Persons each possess numinous passes.

If one wishes to cultivate and study yet does not know how to visualize their forms, the spirits will wander and qi will scatter. Dead qi will knot and sink; malevolent demons will enter the radiance, shortening life and cutting short the years.

If one knows how to cultivate and dissolve the Three Passes, the spirits will settle in their palaces, the numinous will guard the Jade Gate. The knotted joints will dissolve of themselves; dead qi will vanish of itself. The ten thousand spirits will unite in radiance, and one will ascend to heaven in broad daylight.

All people are born endowed with the qi of the Nine Heavens. Qi congeals into essence; essence transforms into cinnabar; cinnabar changes into a human being. The fetal bond is conceived and nurtured according to nature.

Having attained human form, one should return to nourish the original perfected. Let essence overflow the Six Palaces, qi descend to the Spirit Court. Within and without, one will be luminous and fresh, sharing the numinous with the perfected.

This method is lofty and wondrous, not transmitted to lesser immortals. Those who cultivate and attain the Dao will reverse white hair and halt aging, their lifespan equaling the Three Radiant Ones. Heaven and earth will incline toward them. If one rashly divulges its essentials, one’s person will be severely punished.

All scholars of the highest learning must first dissolve the knots of the Three Passes within the body.

The way to dissolve the knots also requires that, in the month of the fetal bond, one nourish the original essence. Let the dead knots sink and dissolve; the Nine Perfected will guard the numinous. True qi having descended, one will naturally attain longevity. When qi and image correspond, one will achieve success without study.

In practicing this method, suppose one was born in the seventh month—then the gestation is ten months. For a ten-month gestation, one receives the qi of the *Parinirmitavaśavartin* Heaven. On the first, eleventh, and twenty-first days of the tenth month, at dawn, noon, and midnight—three times in one month—bathe in fragrant water, burn incense, and enter the chamber. Face the northwest and bow nine times to the Primordial Father of the Nine Heavens. Face the southeast and bow three times to the Mysterious Mother of the Nine Heavens. Then, sit upright facing the lunar station, knock the teeth thirty-six times, close the eyes, and visualize the Heavenly King of *Parinirmitavaśavartin*, surnamed Jade, named *Ling Wu*, clad in a nine-colored, seamless, dark-cloud treasure-fur robe, wearing a *Wuji Liuhuang Tianxing Feijing* crown, riding a five-colored cloud chariot, followed by twelve Jade Lads of the Grand Mystery, descending to enter one’s body and guard the Muddy Pellet Palace.

Visualize verdant clouds swirling densely, crowning and enveloping your body. After a long while, draw the cloud-qi into your mouth and swallow it nine times, then softly intone:

The Primordial spreads qi, the Yang Dao opens and flows,
The Two Images descend in union, azure and yellow follow.
Above, they transform the Nine Elixirs; within the Three Palaces, essence congeals.
Form accords with nature; qi accords with the Great Void.
The Thearch guards the numinous; the Mysterious Mother watches the chamber.
The myriad spirits settle in peace; the six viscera flourish within.
The Nine Heavens’ coronet and sash descend; the Three Radiances shed their light.
The Five Perfected assist and protect; the body returns to emptiness and hollowness.
Riding the void, driving the floating, ascend to the Thearch’s hall.

When finished, swallow qi nine more times, then swallow saliva twenty-four times to conclude. Thus the qi of the Nine Heavens nourishes the body, and when the time comes to form the embryo, stagnation, accumulations, and nodules will not arise again in the Three Passes. Practicing this for three years, one may foreknow events a myriad leagues away and the omens of fortune and misfortune. This is because the joints receive the real, and the orifices open to clarity.

In the eleventh month, receive the qi of *Brahmakāyika* Heaven. On the second, twelfth, and twenty-second days of the month, at dawn, noon, and midnight—three times in one month—bathe in fragrant water, burn incense, and enter the chamber. Face the northwest and bow nine times to the Primordial Father. Face the southeast and bow three times to the Mysterious Mother. Then, sit upright facing the lunar station, knock the teeth thirty-six times, close the eyes, and visualize the Heavenly King of *Brahmakāyika*, surnamed Mystery, named *Yun Hong*, clad in a nine-colored, phoenix-winged, soaring-cloud treasure-fur robe, wearing a *Xuanchen Chensing Liujing* crown, riding a white qilin-drawn, plain-cloud flying chariot, followed by thirty-two Jade Lads of Mount Taihua, descending to enter the Grotto Chamber within your body. Visualize emerald clouds swirling densely, crowning and enveloping your form. After a long while, draw the cloud-qi into your mouth and swallow it nine times, then softly intone:

The Nine Heavens’ flowing elixir transforms and congeals essence above;
The Primordial Father infuses qi; the Mysterious Mother receives the numinous.
The Five Flowers scatter radiance; the Three Perfected merge as one.
The Thearch commands the register; the Great One inscribes life.
Above, the Mysterious; below, the Yellow—within the Three Palaces, all is solemn and pure.
The nine orifices receive the real; the myriad spirits harmonize in peace.
Riding the turning of the years, return to your original form.
Ascend with qi; be born with spirit.
Soaring through the Mysterious Void, ascend to report at the Thearch’s court.

When finished, swallow qi nine more times, then swallow saliva twenty-four times to conclude. Practicing this for three years, the intestines are refined and qi is augmented; one may foresee what has not yet come to pass. After nine years, the bones become light, and one ascends in broad daylight.

In the twelfth month, receive the qi of *Brahma-pāriṣadya* Heaven. On the third, thirteenth, and twenty-third days of the month, at dawn, noon, and midnight—three times in one month—bathe in fragrant water, burn incense, and enter the chamber. Face the northwest and bow nine times to the Primordial Father. Face the southeast and bow three times to the Mysterious Mother. Then, sit upright facing the lunar station, knock the teeth thirty-six times, close the eyes, and visualize the Heavenly King of *Brahma-pāriṣadya*, surnamed Essence, named *Wuyun Yao*, clad in a nine-colored, flowing-cloud, dawn-soaring treasure-fur robe, wearing a *Liudan Jiangguan*, *Yingxing Xuanjing* crown, riding a rosy-cloud, cinnabar-sky jade chariot with feathered canopy, followed by twelve Jade Immortals of the Upper Palace, descending to enter the Grotto Heaven Bright Hall within your body. chunks.original_text: 九天之气，气已满充，妄置八景，罗列三宫，万神备位，灵真交通，司命定录，太一扶将，三五齐整，运睹太阳，三变九转，返我帝乡，金舆琼盖，夹引玉光，来降我身，安我金堂，与我相保，与我同翔，腾飞太玄，上宴帝房。 毕，咽气九过，咽液九过止。 如此三年，心生玉华，万气变仙，睹幽察冥，与神共言，九年得乘八景，飞行上清。 从十月结胎，至六月，受九天之气已满，至七月，合十月，天地气盈，受太阳之运而生。 当以七月十日平旦、二十日正中、三十日夜半，一月三日三时，香汤沐浴，入室烧香，西北向九拜，转东南向三拜，还向本命上平坐，叩齿三十六通，思九天元父讳遵回，从天西北来下，入兆身泥丸之中； 玄母讳沌还，从天东南来下，入兆身丹田命门之中。 元父化为青气，玄母化为黄气，青气从泥丸中下，黄气从命门中上，二气合会绛宫中，二气混黄，更相缠绕，须臾，青气化为婴儿，黄气化为凤皇，凤皇口衔九丹流精保命之符，以哺婴儿之口，婴儿受符毕，化为圆日，还出头上，凤皇化为月景，还下命门之中，日月二光遥相映照，洞达一身，因引日精八十一咽，引月光四十五咽止，微祝曰： 上化幽冥，耀形太阳，二气交合，同会绛宫，元化婴儿，玄化凤皇，乍离乍合，九变混黄，日月对处，上下交通，左部帝灵，右翼桃康，白元无英，安守洞房，万神齐景，济济洋洋，升降流精，内结玉光，表裹羽仪，龙舆来迎，飞行玄虚，上升太空。 毕，便服九丹流精保命之符。 讫又咽气九过，咽掖九过止。 如此三年，真人见形，面有金容，体生奇光，九年飞腾，白日升天也。 九丹流精保命之符 青书竹膜上，向本命，三时服三枚。 此通腹炼髓，化骨结神，三年举体同化也。 服符先祝曰： 天降地升，二气交隆，九丹变化，结精中房，八景散灵，六府内昌，万神齐清、长享太肠，终天极地，欢乐未央。 毕，服符竟，咽九气止也。 凡修此道，皆当计受胎月数，随月行事，竟十月都止也。 此胎精中记，学仙之本根，求生之渊源。 学无此道，徒劳自勤，无益於形神也。 形不被炼，结根不断，真神游散，虽有云舆来降，形亦不能自飞也。 至秘之道，慎告非真，盟科考重，殃累子身。 秘修苦念，克得上仙，白日飞腾也。 若不知结胎之月，当以本命之辰为胎月，而行之也。 假令本命寅，生正月，便为胎月也。 他即效之。 九丹上化胎精中记，一名琼胎灵曜，乃生九玄之初，结太空自然之气，以成宝文，二十四真、三十九帝，悉所修行。 太帝君以传南极夫人，南极夫人以传太微天帝君，太微天帝君以传后圣金阙帝君，金阙帝君以传上相青童君。 青童君更撰集施用，上下次第，付西城真人。 西王母今封一通於瀛洲方丈。 依科七千年有骨相合仙，名书帝箓之人，得传。 今有其人，七百年中听得三传。 有得其文，给玉童玉女各九人，侍卫典者，营护有经者身。 轻慢灵文，传非其人，泄露天真，七祖父母，充责三官，运石摙山，万劫不原，己身被考，长闭地狱，不得入仙。 授经，师与弟子对斋九十日，或三十日，赍上金一斤，白绢八十尺，丹一斤，以代列誓之信，北向跪盟而传。 不得轻传，无盟无信，而修其道，殃延七玄，己身充责，负罪幽夜，万劫不原，学者明慎，慎勿妄宣。

After three years of such practice, the Perfected One appears in form, the face bearing a golden countenance, the body emanating wondrous light. After nine years, one soars aloft and ascends to Heaven in broad daylight.

**The Talisman of Nine Elixirs Flowing Essence for Preserving Life**
Inscribed in azure on bamboo membrane, face your natal destiny and ingest three talismans at the three periods of the day. This penetrates the abdomen, refines the marrow, transforms the bones, and coalesces the spirit. After three years, the entire body undergoes transmutation.

Before ingesting the talisman, intone:
Heaven descends and Earth ascends; the two qi intermingle in abundance. The Nine Elixirs transform and change, crystallizing essence within the central chamber. The Eight Effulgences scatter their numinosity, and the Six Palaces flourish within. The ten thousand spirits unite in purity, eternally enjoying the Great Intestine. They traverse the ends of Heaven and Earth, their joy unending.

When this is complete, ingest the talisman and swallow the nine qi to conclude.

In practicing this Dao, one must calculate the months of gestation and proceed accordingly, completing the full ten months. This is the *Record of Embryonic Essence within the Womb*, the root of immortal study and the wellspring of seeking life. Without this Dao, one’s diligence is in vain, bringing no benefit to body or spirit. If the body is not refined and the root of karma remains unsevered, the true spirit wanders astray. Even if cloud chariots descend, the body cannot ascend of its own accord.

This is the most secret of Dao, to be cautiously imparted only to the truly devoted. The covenant is solemn, and violations bring calamity upon oneself. Through secret cultivation and earnest devotion, one may attain transcendence and ascend to Heaven in broad daylight.

If the month of conception is unknown, use the month of one’s natal destiny as the gestational month and proceed accordingly. For example, if one’s natal destiny is in the first month (tiger), then the first month is the gestational month. Others should follow this model.

The *Record of Embryonic Essence Transformed by the Nine Elixirs* is also called *Luminous Womb of the Jade Embryo*. It arises at the inception of the Nine Mysteries, crystallizing the natural qi of the Great Emptiness to form its precious script. The Twenty-Four Perfected and the Thirty-Nine Emperors all practiced this method. The Supreme Thearch transmitted it to the Lady of the Southern Culmen, who transmitted it to the Thearch of the Grand Tenuity. The Thearch of the Grand Tenuity transmitted it to the Golden Portal Thearch of Later Saints, who transmitted it to the Azure Lad of the Supreme Minister. The Azure Lad compiled and arranged its sequence of practice, entrusting it to the Perfected One of the Western City. The Queen Mother of the West has now sealed one copy on Mount Fangzhang in Yingzhou.

According to the statutes, those whose bones align with immortality after seven thousand years—whose names are recorded in the imperial register—may receive this transmission. In the present era, within seven hundred years, it may be transmitted three times. Those who obtain this text are attended by nine jade lads and nine jade maidens, who guard and protect the practitioner’s body.

To treat the sacred text with disrespect, transmit it to the unworthy, or reveal celestial secrets brings retribution upon one’s seven generations of ancestors, who are punished by the Three Officials. They are condemned to carry stones and pile mountains for ten thousand kalpas without reprieve. One’s own body is subjected to trial, eternally confined to the earthly prisons, barred from entering immortality.

When transmitting this scripture, master and disciple must face each other in a fast for ninety days, or at least thirty days. The disciple must offer one catty of gold, eighty feet of white silk, and one catty of elixir as tokens of the covenant’s sincerity. Kneeling and facing north, they swear the oath before transmission.

This must not be lightly transmitted. Without covenant or sincerity, practicing this Dao brings calamity upon the seven mysteries, and one’s own body bears the punishment. Burdened with guilt, one wanders the dark night for ten thousand kalpas without reprieve. Practitioners must be prudent and cautious, never recklessly divulging this teaching.
